title: E88 A Low Key Brothel and a Japanese Skater Boy
description:
Ok, stop pinching people's butts and do something good. This week Em dives into the haunts of the Cary Hotel in Placerville, California and one ghost, in particular, who has quite the sexual appetite. There's also gold dust and ghost cats involved so get ready for a wild ride. Meanwhile Christine shares the brutal and baffling murders of the Setagaya Family in Japan. Our parting words of wisdom this week? Don't bother taking the elevator... and that's why we drink!
Please consider supporting the companies who support us! 
Sign up for FabFitFun today to get your Fall Editors Box! Use code DRINK to get $10 off your first box at www.fabfitfun.com
For 25% off your first Rx Bar order visit www.rxbar.com/drink and enter promo code DRINK at check out!
Sign up for First Leaf and get 3 bottles of wine for only $15 with free shipping! Go to tryfirstleaf.com/drink today!
Go to newyorker.com/drink to get 50% off when you enter the code DRINK - plus you'll get the exclusive New Yorker tote bag!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
